ValidationRule.description: created as part of BIZ-45114. When user selects a value in ‘SFA Cap Time Horizon’, user should be required to enter a value in either ‘SFA Prefix’ or ‘SFA Suffix’.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT( SFA_Cap_Time_Horizon__c ))), AND( ISBLANK(TEXT( SFA_Prefix__c )), ISBLANK(TEXT( SFA_Suffix__c )) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please pick SFA Cap Prefix and/or Suffix values.
